name: SteamGear
description:
Control a gear and navigate through the small mine to activate three steam engines. Explore the mines, avoid obstacles and get those engine going!

******************************************
Controls:

A - Move Left

D - Move Right

Space Bar - Jump / Double Jump

E - Interact and Release

******************************************

Team members:

- Christian Meurin

- Eileen Lingard

- Josh Tellez
